name: Metro Meltdown (Demo)
description:
This demo only contains the first level of the game. I wanted to quickly get the first level of the game AND this demo done as soon as I can. Also, this is the first actual project I'm working on (other than game jams and experimental projects,) so expect a lot of bugs in the demo and the full game lol.

Oh yea, the full game's going to be completely free, so don't worry about the price lol.

And also, this game was tested on an Oculus/Meta Quest 2, so I'm not too sure on how this will play/control on an Index or Vive.

Metro Meltdown is a singleplayer VR shooter where your only and current desire is to escape the city you live in due to a vast variety of reasons. (At least in the full game,) you'll be having to run, fight, ride, and grapple your way through a bunch of levels in order to escape your city and finally find some peace and quiet.

Also, in the main menu, you can find four sandbox levels for you to mess around in. Some of them being the test levels I made for this buggy mess of a game.

Although, as said above, this demo only contains the first level of the game, so there won't be any grappling or riding stuff, just the fighting and maybe the running ;/

In This Demo:
  • Bust through robots with around 4-5 weapons
  • Mess around in four sandbox modes, some of them being test levels I made for Metro Meltdown
  • Umm... that's all I can think of and shove on this list lol
